function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited civil liberties due to containment measures","Impact":"Increased social unrest and dissatisfaction","Mitigation":"Balancing disease containment with civil liberties and public engagement","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies for contact tracing and monitoring","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and policy makers"},{"Description":"Authoritarian measures in response to the pandemic","Impact":"Undermining of democratic principles and human rights","Mitigation":"Ensuring temporary measures and safeguarding democratic processes","Technologies":"Public engagement technologies for policy influence","People":"General public, dissidents","Owner":"International organizations, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Promotion of neoliberalism as a remedy to pandemic-related failures","Impact":"Exacerbation of global inequality and dissatisfaction","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative economic and social policy approaches","Technologies":"Digital platforms for inclusive policy dialogue and economic restructuring","People":"Economically disadvantaged communities","Owner":"Economic and social policy influencers"}]}
